name: Svaland
description:
Svaland is a fantasy rpg videogame under development by a single person.
For now the game uses internet for login and cloud storage purposes, but it's single player. Current platforms: 🖥️PC 📱Android

⚠️There are some known bugs on PC version and i'm working on a solution for next patch (~ 26/06/2022)

The game starts in Svaland, after king Brodgar's death. This lead to many factions trying to recover the territory once lost in the king's campaign. Players will have to make decissions which can lead to alliances or feuds against other factions. There are races like humans, elves, orcs, dwarves, goblins, midnutens... And many other creatures.

Choose a class for your character

⚔️Fighter, close combat damage and health priority
🛡️Guardian, armor and defensive stats
🏹Hunter, the fastest ranged shooter
🧙Mystic, the most powerful caster



📔No experience or levels.
📕Equipment gives you stats and determine your basic attacks combinations
📙Up to 8 talent points in an unique per class tree
📗Runes & karma (lock/unlock light/dark magic)
📘Choose up to 12 spells from 104 (unknown at start)

🔥Fire🌊Water⛰️Earth🌪️Air⚡Lightning❄️Frost🍃Nature🩸Blood🧪Poison💡Light⚫Darkness💀Unholy🎯Advanced skills: don't require mana, but has severe cooldown ⌛️

🩸Blood spells are paid with health instead of mana🔵

Craft system:

⚗️Brewery: craft potions, elixirs, antydotes or other beberages.
🧵Tailoring: create cloth and leather equipment or objects.
🔨Blacksmith: melt minerals and create metal objects and equipment.
🍳Cooking: convert raw ingredients into delightful nutritive meals.
💎Jewelry: create rings, amulets, necklaces and increase jewel quality.

Plans for future patches:

🐞Bug fixing
🌐Multiplayer mode (co-op, pvp, ffa)
🐲Flying mounts
⚔️More combats & more precise
✨More quests
💰In-Application purchases
🌑Events (single player) 
🌕Monthly events (multiplayer)
⚠️Many more...
